student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! How was your last year? Did you do anything fun?
Yes, I went to the beach. It was fun!
That sounds great! What did you do at the beach? Did you swim or relax?
No problem! Maybe you can think about it. Did you play in the sand, walk by the water, or just enjoy the sun?

Playing in the sand is so much fun! Did you build a sandcastle or just dig around? It’s a great way to enjoy the beach. Thanks for sharing about your trip—it sounds like a lovely memory from last year!
Building a sandcastle is such a fun activity! I’m glad you had a great time at the beach last year. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
